name: Brick Break (rgantzos)
description:
----BRICK BREAK----

How do you play?  Well I'm glad you asked!  There's a How to Play section in the game, but I'll tell you here!  A gray square means that it can't be interacted with.  A white square means that you can place blocks there.  The background color indicates the color of the block you've selected.  Click the white space to place it.  Your goal is to create the most gray blocks in the least amount of time.  You create gray blocks by putting blocks of the same color next to each other.  Give up when you believe you've gotten as far as you can!
